name: Quilt SDK
description: Type-safe TypeScript SDK for Quilt container runtime

methods.name: CreateContainer
methods.description: Creates a new container with advanced features including namespaces, resource limits, and volume mounts

methods.name: StartContainer
methods.description: Starts a stopped container

methods.name: StopContainer
methods.description: Stops a running container gracefully

methods.name: KillContainer
methods.description: Kills a container immediately

methods.name: RemoveContainer
methods.description: Removes a container

methods.name: GetContainerStatus
methods.description: Gets the detailed status of a container

methods.name: GetContainerLogs
methods.description: Gets the logs of a container

methods.name: ExecContainer
methods.description: Executes a command in a running container

methods.name: GetContainerByName
methods.description: Gets a container ID by its name

methods.name: CreateVolume
methods.description: Creates a new named volume

methods.name: RemoveVolume
methods.description: Removes a named volume

methods.name: ListVolumes
methods.description: Lists all volumes

methods.name: InspectVolume
methods.description: Inspects a volume to get detailed information

methods.name: GetHealth
methods.description: Gets the health status of the Quilt server

methods.name: GetMetrics
methods.description: Gets metrics for containers and system

methods.name: GetSystemInfo
methods.description: Gets system information including version and runtime

methods.name: StreamEvents
methods.description: Streams container events in real-time

methods.name: ListActiveMonitors
methods.description: Lists all active container monitors

methods.name: GetMonitorStatus
methods.description: Gets the status of a specific container monitor

methods.name: ListMonitoringProcesses
methods.description: Lists all monitoring processes

methods.name: ListNetworkAllocations
methods.description: Lists all network allocations for containers

methods.name: GetContainerNetwork
methods.description: Gets the network configuration for a container

methods.name: SetContainerNetwork
methods.description: Sets the network configuration for a container

methods.name: SetupContainerNetworkPostStart
methods.description: Sets up container network after container start

methods.name: ListDnsEntries
methods.description: Lists all DNS entries for containers

methods.name: GetCleanupStatus
methods.description: Gets the cleanup status for containers

methods.name: ListCleanupTasks
methods.description: Lists all cleanup tasks

methods.name: GetCleanupTaskStatus
methods.description: Gets the status of a specific cleanup task

methods.name: ListContainerCleanupTasks
methods.description: Lists cleanup tasks for a specific container

methods.name: ForceCleanup
methods.description: Forces cleanup of a container and its resources

methods.name: ComprehensiveNetworkCleanup
methods.description: Performs comprehensive network cleanup of all resources
